name: Calendar
description: Interact with macOS Calendar.app - get events, search, create events, and open events

tools.name: get_events
tools.description: Get calendar events in a specified date range

tools.name: search_events
tools.description: Search for calendar events that match the search text

tools.name: open_event
tools.description: Open a specific calendar event in the Calendar app
